keyMoments.title: Destroys Hody's Kirisame Weapon
keyMoments.description: Luffy breaks off the scythe blade on Hody's fin during their underwater combat.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's strength even while weakened underwater as a Devil Fruit user.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Haki's Limitation Against Piercing Attacks
keyMoments.description: After being bitten by Hody, Luffy explains that his Busoshoku Haki protects against blunt attacks but isn't yet strong enough to withstand piercing damage.
keyMoments.significance: Important revelation showing that despite two years of training, Luffy's Haki still has room for improvement.
keyMoments.quote: My Busoshoku Haki is good for blunt attacks, but is not strong enough for my body to withstand piercing.

keyMoments.title: Uses Haki-Imbued Jet Pistol
keyMoments.description: Luffy combines his Gear Second Jet Pistol with Busoshoku Haki, sending Hody flying with enhanced power.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the evolution of Luffy's signature techniques with Haki enhancement.

abilities.description: Luffy's Gear Second Jet Pistol enhanced with Busoshoku Haki for increased power.

reveals.information: Busoshoku Haki is effective against blunt attacks but not yet strong enough to fully protect against piercing damage

name.japanese: ホーディ・ジョーンズ

keyMoments.title: Destroys the Air Bubble
keyMoments.description: Hody deliberately destroys the air bubble surrounding the ship to gain advantage as a fish-man in water.
keyMoments.significance: Critical tactical decision that puts Luffy in mortal danger and demonstrates Hody's cunning.

keyMoments.title: Uses Umidaiko (Ocean Drum)
keyMoments.description: Hody demonstrates the Fish-Man Karate technique Umidaiko, sending a powerful shockwave through water.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Hody's Fish-Man Karate abilities, though his technique is later noted to be amateur level.

keyMoments.title: Energy Steroid Transformation
keyMoments.description: Hody consumes additional Energy Steroids and undergoes a dramatic physical transformation, becoming massively more muscular.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the dangerous power and side effects of Energy Steroids, setting up his eventual downfall.

abilities.description: Punches the water to send a powerful shockwave through it that strikes opponents with devastating force.

keyMoments.title: Rescues Luffy from Drowning
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi arrives and rescues Luffy from drowning after Hody destroys the air bubble.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Neptune brothers' commitment to protecting those trying to help their kingdom.

keyMoments.title: Uses Ultramarine
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi demonstrates Merman Combat: Ultramarine, hurling a massive torrent of water at Hody.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Fukaboshi's Merman Combat abilities, showing water manipulation techniques unique to merfolk.

keyMoments.title: Confronts Hody About His Motivations
keyMoments.description: Fukaboshi demands to know what humans did to Hody to make him hate them so much.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the revelation of Hody's true nature - that his hatred is inherited prejudice, not personal tragedy.

abilities.description: Grabs water with hands and hurls it forward in a mighty, extremely large torrent that blasts away opponents.

keyMoments.title: Protected by Manboshi from Hody's Attack
keyMoments.description: Shirahoshi is attacked by Hody while trying to wake Vander Decken IX, but Manboshi shields her.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Shirahoshi's continued vulnerability and her brothers' devotion to protecting her.

keyMoments.title: Shields Shirahoshi from Hody's Attack
keyMoments.description: Manboshi takes the brunt of Hody's attack to protect his sister Shirahoshi.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Neptune brothers' willingness to sacrifice themselves for Shirahoshi.

keyMoments.title: Flashback About Noah and Joy Boy's Promise
keyMoments.description: Neptune recalls the ancient history of Noah and the promise made with Joy Boy centuries ago.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals crucial world-building information about the Void Century and Joy Boy's broken promise.

name.japanese: バンダー・デッケン九世

keyMoments.title: Unconscious on Noah
keyMoments.description: Vander Decken IX remains unconscious while Shirahoshi tries desperately to wake him.
keyMoments.significance: His unconscious state means Noah continues falling toward Fish-Man Island uncontrolled.
